Scoutr

Scoutr was a new take on consuming content - instead of going through a linear timeline, we had a spatial interface that allowed users to explore the content around them.

On this project, I worked in conjunction with another team member to design the mobile app interface. We unfortunately did not get to implement the design.

Main screen where users can explore stories happening around them

Trending stories once the user opens the search panel

Story turns into a GO button when users taps

Individual story screen where users can browse photos


Prototype made using Keynote
